S02madadh_u:2_0: [1] evaṃ mayā śrutam ekasmin samaye bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati sma /
S02madadh_u:2_2_0: tatrāyuṣmān rāhulo 'tīva viheṭhyate devagrahair nāgagrahair yakṣagrahai rākṣasagrahaiḥ kinnaragrahair garuḍagrahair mahoragagrahair
S02madadh_u:2_2_1: manuṣyagrahair amanuṣyagrahaiḥ pretagrahair bhūtagrahaiḥ piśācagrahaiḥ kumbhāṇḍagrahair dvīpibhiḥ kākair ulūkaiḥ kīṭaiḥ sarīsṛpaiṛ
S02madadh_u:3_0_0: [2] athāyuṣmān rāhulo yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrānta upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivanditvā bhagavantaṃ tripradakṣiṇīkṛtya
S02madadh_u:3_0_1: bhagavataḥ purato rudann aśrūṇi pravartayati sma /
S02madadh_u:4_0: [3] atha bhagavān jānann eva rāhulam āmantrayate sma /
S02madadh_u:4_1: kiṃ tvaṃ rāhula mama purataḥ sthitvā aśrūṇi pravartayasi /
S02madadh_u:4_2: evam ukte āyuṣmān rāhulo bhagavantam etad avocat /
S02madadh_u:4_5_0: so 'haṃ bhagavaṃs tatra viheṭhye devagrahair nāgagrahair yakṣagrahai rākṣasagrahaiḥ kinnaragrahair garuḍagrahair mahoragagrahair
S02madadh_u:4_5_1: manuṣyagrahair amanuṣyagrahaiḥ pretagrahair bhūtagrahaiḥ piśācagrahaiḥ kumbhāṇḍagrahair dvīpibhiḥ kākair ulūkaiḥ kīṭaiḥ sarīsṛpair
S02madadh_u:5_0: [4] atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ rāhulam āmantrayate sma /
S02madadh_u:5_1: udgṛhṇa tvaṃ rāhula imāṃ mahādaṇḍadhāraṇīṃ vidyām /
S02madadh_u:5_2: catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ rakṣāvaraṇaguptaye bhikṣūṇāṃ bhikṣuṇīnām upāsakānām upāsikānāṃ ca dīrgharātram arthāya hitāya sukhāya bhaviṣyati /
S02madadh_u:6_0_0: [5] tadyathā / aṅgā / vaṅgā / bhaṅgā / varaṅgā / saṃsārataraṅgā / sāsadaṅgā / bhaṅgā / jesurā / ekatarā / ara vīrā / tara
S02madadh_u:6_0_1: vīrā / kara vīrā / kara kara vīrā / indrā / indrakisarā / haṃsā / haṃsakisarā / picimalā / mahākiccā / viheṭhikā / kālucchikā /
S02madadh_u:6_0_2: aṅgodarā / jayā / jayālikā / velā / elā / cintāli / cili cili / hili hili / sumati / vasumati / culu naṭṭe / culu culu naṭṭe /
S02madadh_u:6_0_3: culu nāḍi / kunāḍi / hārīṭaki / kārīṭaki / gauri / gandhāri / caṇḍāli / mātaṅgi / dharaṇi dhāraṇi / uṣṭrapālike / kaca kārike /
S02madadh_u:6_0_4: cala nāṭike / kākalike / lalamati / rakṣamati / varākule / manmate utpale / kara vīre / tara vīre / tara tara vīre / kuru
S02madadh_u:6_0_5: vīre / kuru kuru vīre / curu vīre / curu curu vīre / mahāvīre / iramati / varamati / rakṣamati / sarvārthasādhani / paramārthasādhani /
S02madadh_u:6_0_6: apratihate / indro rājā / yamo rājā / varuṇo rājā / kubero rājā / manasvī rājā / vāsukī rājā / daṇḍāgnī rājā / brahmā sahasrādhipatī
S02madadh_u:6_1: anuttaro lokānukampakaḥ / mama sarvasattvānāṃ ca rakṣāṃ kurvantu /
S02madadh_u:6_2: paritrāṇaṃ parigrahaṃ paripālanaṃ śāntiṃ svastyayanaṃ daṇḍaparihāraṃ śastraparihāraṃ viṣadūṣaṇaṃ viṣanāśanaṃ sīmābandhaṃ dharaṇībandhaṃ ca kurvantu /
S02madadh_u:7_0_0: [6] tadyathā / balavati / varamati / talamati / lakṣamati / rakṣamati / huru huru / phuru phuru / cara cara / khara khara /
S02madadh_u:7_0_1: khuru khuru / mati mati / bhūmicaṇḍe / kālikeṭi / akisalā / pīne / sāmalate / hūle sthūle / sthūlaśikhare / jaya sthūle /
S02madadh_u:7_0_2: jaya naṭṭe / cala nāsi / culu nāsi / vāgbandhani / virohaṇi / solohite / aṇḍare / paṇḍare / karāle / kinnare / keyūre / ketumati /
S02madadh_u:7_0_3: bhūtaṃgame / bhūtamati / dhanye / maṅgalye / mahābalalohitamūle / acalacaṇḍe / dhuraṃdharā / jayālike / jayā / gorohaṇi /
S02madadh_u:7_0_4: curu curu / rundha rundha / dhuru dhuru / khuru khuru / khurumati / bandhumati / dhuraṃdhare / dhare dhare / vidhare vimati /
S02madadh_u:7_0_5: viṣkambhaṇi / nāśani vināśani / bandhani / mokṣaṇi / mocani / mohani / bhāvani / śodhani / saṃśodhani viśodhani / saṃkhiraṇi /
S02madadh_u:7_0_6: saṃchindani / sādhu turumāṇe / hara hara bandhumati / hiri hiri / khiri khiri / kharali / huru huru / piṅgale / namo 'stu
S02madadh_u:8_0_0: [7] asyāṃ khalu rāhula mahādaṇḍadhāraṇyāṃ vidyāyām antaśo 'ṣṭottaraśatapadānāṃ sūtraṃ granthiṃ baddhāyāṃ hastena dhāryamāṇāyāṃ
S02madadh_u:8_0_1: kaṇṭhena dhāryamāṇāyāṃ samantād yojanaśatasya rakṣā kṛtā bhaviṣyati /
S02madadh_u:8_1: gandhair vā puṣpair vā mudrābhir vā naiva manuṣyo vāmanuṣyo vābhibhaviṣyati /
S02madadh_u:8_2: na viṣaṃ na śastraṃ na rogo na jvaro na prajvaro na vidyāmantro na vetāḍaḥ /
S02madadh_u:8_3: na vyādhau nāgnau na viṣodakena kālaṃ kariṣyati /
S02madadh_u:8_4: vidyāmantraprayogānāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ sādhuprayuktānāṃ ca bandhanī /
S02madadh_u:8_7: vajrapāṇiś cāsya mahāyakṣasenāpatir vajreṇādīptena samprajvālitena ekajvālībhūtena dhyāyitvā mūrdhānaṃ sphoṭayet /
S02madadh_u:8_8: catvāraś ca mahārājāno 'yomayena cakreṇa kṣuradhārāprahāreṇa vināśayeyuḥ /
S02madadh_u:9_0: [8] asyāṃ khalu rāhula mahādaṇḍadhāraṇyāṃ vidyāyāṃ sakṛtparivartitāyāṃ rājacaurodakāgniviṣaśastrāṭavīkāntāraparvatadurgamadhyagataḥ sarvabhayebhyaḥ pratimucyate /
S02madadh_u:9_1_0: iyaṃ khalu mahādaṇḍadhāraṇīvidyā ekanavatigaṅgānadīvālikāsamair buddhair bhāṣitā bhāṣyate bhāṣiṣyate ca siddhā paramasiddhā
S02madadh_u:9_2: sarvabhayopadraveṣu mama sarvasattvānāṃ ca śivam ārogyaṃ bhavatu /
S02madadh_u:10_0: [9] idam avocad bhagavān āttamanā āyuṣmān rāhulo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandann iti /
